lines.content: - Used AI to help identify why `Tyrone` class was not being found across packages.
- Confirmed missing imports and constructor mismatch were the cause.
- Verified correct Gradle + JavaFX configuration steps.
- Used AI to suggest edge cases for testing command parsing.
- Helped think through invalid input cases (e.g., missing index, malformed deadlines).
- Used suggestions to manually create expected `.txt` output test cases.
All code changes were reviewed and adjusted manually before being committed.
AI was used only for debugging guidance and test case brainstorming.
